@NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Well, what a surprise..if so it'll doubtless due to water they've contaminated..The Lyme Brook earlier this week was cloudy.
RT @PJennings88: For those concerned about the risk to the chalk aquifer  caused by HS2 tunnelling we need access to see the details the en…

For those concerned about the risk to the chalk aquifer  caused by HS2 tunnelling we need access to see the details the environmental approval application lodged with the @EnvAgency recently. The contact email would be enquiries@environment-agency.gov.uk.
@PJennings88 @EnvAgency Is there a link to the application or is it the normal restriction of “You have to make an appointment to visit the local EA office to view the application”?
@EJBPix @EnvAgency It’s out of control. Though it’s nearly impossible to use the public tip now. Not helping matters and high cost of recycling @EnvAgency  change enough for nothing!

@EnvAgency I’m speaking from experience, if @EnvAgency didn’t make it so hard to recycle this probably wouldn’t happen. The attitude of your fresh out of university officers wasn’t the best, they didn’t understand the job they was in.Keep it was simple @EnvAgency.

@SianieRoo @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA would you please respond and put our minds at rest about what the blue powder is? It could be something innocent & allowed but peace of mind means an awful lot, thank you! @StinkStopthe @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL
RT @PJennings88: Over six years ago we predicted HS2 would make their application to @EnvAgency to approve tunnelling at the last moment an…

Over six years ago we predicted HS2 would make their application to @EnvAgency to approve tunnelling at the last moment and sure enough they have. Why did they do this? purely to avoid public scrutiny of this highly dubious activity that puts rivers and drinking water at risk.
